CustomField.description: Valid only for CustomObject, CustomField, and CustomObject data records. Determines how changes to data records are handled by Strongpoint.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Not Tracked: changes in data records are not tracked by Strongpoint Tracked, Blocking: changes in data records are blocked if there is no approved Change Request Tracked, Non-Blocking: changes in data records are logged by Strongpoint
CustomField.label: Data Change Tracking
